title: Dungeon Full Dive
description: Originally funded with a Kickstarter Campaign, Dungeon Full Dive is the most immersive way to play Tabletop RPGs (TTRPGs) like Dungeons & Dragons for VR and PC. Next to the technical challenge of building a sandbox game compatible with both platforms, I successfully managed a team of up to 5 Developers and 3 QA.

title: Fantasy Tavern
description: A Game created during a Game Jam where you and your friends are tasked with managing a bar and all its angry customers in VR. Next to programming, I learned to manage Art Direction and worked on Shaders & VFX.

title: Order Automation Web App
description: An interface for automating orders of hearing aids that connects internal Web Apps & User interfaces to the ERP systems of various manufacturers. In addition to the programming, I communicated with customers to manage and understand their expectation.
